item.title: Extend local network to cloud with Nebula
item.author: sklenar.pav@gmail.com
item.dc:creator: Pavel Sklenar
item.description: Nebula Network Nebula is a scalable overlay networking tool with a focus on performance, simplicity, and security. It lets you seamlessly connect computers anywhere in the world. This post is about extending the local network by another server running anywhere in the world, everything secured by the Nebula network. Devices on the local network should be able to access devices on the Nebula network and some devices need to access devices on the local network as well.
